title: News24.com | Limpopo resort declared 'green zone' after Wuhan evacuees released from quarantine
description: The Ranch Resort in Limpopo is now a 'green zone' and no longer on lockdown, President Cyril Ramaphosa has said.
content:
The Ranch Resort in Limpopo is now a "green zone" and no longer on lockdown, President Cyril Ramaphosa said on Sunday.
Ramaphosa was speaking outside the resort before sending off 112 citizens who were repatriated from China's Wuhan City, where the virus bro… [+1728 chars]
